mapper.select: SELECT ss.school_id AS schoolId, ss.supplier_id AS supplierId, ss.school_name AS schoolName, ss.project_name AS projectName, ps.supplier_name AS supplierName FROM t_edu_school_supplier ss INNER JOIN t_pro_supplier ps ON ss.supplier_id=ps.id WHERE ss.stat=1 AND ps.stat=1
SELECT id AS supplierId, supplier_name AS supplierName FROM t_pro_supplier WHERE stat=1
